text: Stan Getz Quartet Live in Paris is a live album by saxophonist Stan Getz which was recorded France in 1982 but not released on the French Dreyfus Jazz label until 1996.Stan Getz Catalog, accessed July 26, 2016Stan Getz discography: 1980's, accessed July 26, 2016 ==Reception== The Allmusic site rated the album with 4 stars. ==Track listing== # "O Grande Amor" (Antônio Carlos Jobim) - 6:04 # "Blood Count" (Billy Strayhorn) - 5:02 # "Airegin" (Sonny Rollins) - 8:28 # "Blue Skies" (Irving Berlin) - 7:28 # "On the Up and Up" (Jim McNeely) - 9:46 # "I Wanted to Say" (Victor Lewis) - 10:15 # "Tempus Fugit" (Bud Powell) - 10:06 == Personnel == *Stan Getz - tenor saxophone *Jim McNeely - piano *Marc Johnson - bass *Victor Lewis - drums == References == Category:1996 live albums Category:Stan Getz live albums
title: Stan Getz Quartet Live in Paris
